sentence.Network_en: He had not submitted in advance for the approval of his comrades in the Party Presidium.
sentence.Network_cn: 他事先没有征求党的主席团同志的意见,并取得他们的同意.

sentence.Network_en: Congress presidium routine President Gu Xiulian presides over the opening ceremony.
sentence.Network_cn: 大会主席团常务主席顾秀莲主持开幕式.

sentence.Network_en: On Sep 1 st, we held a meeting attended only by presidium.
sentence.Network_cn: 9月1日, 俱乐部主席团成员会议.

not long ago , the ruling alliance presidium decided to revoke Serbian Democratic Party's 21 seats in the Parliament , resulting in the Serbian Democratic Party to set up a " shadow cabinet " .不久前，执政党联盟主席团决定剥夺塞民主党在塞议会中的２１个席位，从而导致塞民主党成立“影子内阁”。

when the National People's Congress meets , it elects a presidium to conduct its session .全国人民代表大会举行会议的时候，选举主席团主持会议。

derivation.yuyuan_name: 1920s: from Russian prezidium, from Latin praesidium 'protection, garrison' (see preside)

means.word_mean: 1. a permanent executive committee in socialist countries that has all the powers of some larger legislative body and that acts for it when it is not in session

auth_sentence.content: Three years later he was rewarded by being created chairman of the Presidium of the Supreme Soviet.

auth_sentence.res_content_con: Three years later he was rewarded by being created chairman of the Presidium of the Supreme Soviet.

stems_affixes.value_cn: 值得考虑的, 相当可观的
stems_affixes.word_buile: consider[v.考虑,细想;体谅,顾及;认为,把…看作]+able能……的→adj.值得考虑的, 相当可观的
side旁边→n.边, 旁边, 面;adj.旁边的, 侧面的
in进入+side边→adj.&n.&adv.里面[的,地],内部[的,地]
out外面+side边→adj.&n.&adv.外面[的,地],外部[的,地]
considerable[adj.值得考虑的, 相当可观的]+ly表副词→considerably相当地
preside主持+ium地方或团体→n.主席团
reside[v.居住,驻扎;属于]+nce→n.住处,住宅
considerate[adj.考虑周到的,体谅的]+ion表名词→consideration体谅, 考虑
side旁边→n.边, 旁边, 面;adj.旁边的, 侧面的
side旁边+way路→n.小路, 小巷,人行道
super在……上面+sede=side坐→坐上去→淘汰[以前的东西]

means.word_mean: 主席团,(尤指共产党国家的)常务委员会

sentences.en: The presidium has decided to hold this evening’s meeting elsewhere.
sentences.cn: 主席团决定今天晚上的会议另选会场。

sentences.en: Then the congress elected its presidium.
sentences.cn: 然后代表大会选出主席团。
